title: Simulation-Based Science Education Fellowship: Applying the 4-Component Instructional Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic science concepts and proficiency in digital devices (smartphones)
context.additional_context: Strengthening simulation-based instructional design competencies using smartphones in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design one or more simulation-based science education scenarios by applying the 4-component instructional design model (objectives, assessments, learning activities, instructional methods)
Learners can produce simulation educational materials (images/videos) using smartphone-based digital tools and upload them to sharing platforms
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of designed simulation education programs and derive improvement plans through peer assessment and self-reflection

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
